mapper.insert: insert into room (ro_num, ro_name, pension_pen_addr, ro_price, ro_info, ro_max_person, business_bu_email, picture_pic_num) values (#{ro_num}, #{ro_name}, #{pension_pen_addr}, #{ro_price}, #{ro_info}, #{ro_max_person}, #{business_bu_email}, #{picture_pic_num})
mapper.update: update room set ro_name = #{ro_name}, pension_pen_addr = #{pension_pen_addr}, ro_price = #{ro_price}, ro_info = #{ro_info}, ro_max_person = #{ro_max_person}, business_bu_email = #{business_bu_email}, picture_pic_num = #{picture_pic_num} where ro_num = #{ro_num}
